Map the local volume into the container
Start webpack watcher process on that shared volume
Use the Development settings
body_html:
To facilitate containerized local development, create a new docker compose file which sets up the following things:

  1. Map the local volume into the container
  2. Start webpack watcher process on that shared volume
  3. Use the Development settings
title: Create a development docker compose file
body:
To facilitate containerized local development, create a new docker compose file which sets up the following things:

1) Map the local volume into the container
2) Start webpack watcher process on that shared volume
3) Use the Development settings
